pages.text: $(marked)Baphomet$(), an ancient Greater Demon of magic, first Name of Fire, Flame etc. etc. provides contracts to many witches all over the world.$(br)When pledging to them, one may acquire $(l:bewitchment:contracts/contracts_intro)$(item)Contracts$() for $(marked)experience$(), now without $(o)any$() drawbacks.$(br2)Baphomet can be $(l:bewitchment:rituals/summon_baphomet)$(marked)summoned$() by any sufficiently strong witch.
